subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Gil Morgan won his 25th career Champions Tour title, closing with a five-under 67 for a two-stroke victory over Hale Irwin in the Wal-Mart First Tee Open at Pebble Beach. The 60-year-old Morgan won at Pebble Beach 15 years after a disappointing finish in the United States Open there.
